name: Solaright
description: Complete the electrical circuit on a cube in jigsaw fashion to light up the tree!
minimum_requirements: OS: OS Windows 7 SP1 Processor: CPU Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1450 MB available space
